message.raw: Changed PSSM shadows to take advantage of hardare PCF, a driver hack that provides 4-sample interpolated shadow edges. Changed shader to use hardware PCF and a 9-sample Poisson disk filter for shadow smoothing.
message.html: Changed PSSM shadows to take advantage of hardare PCF, a driver hack that provides 4-sample interpolated shadow edges. Changed shader to use hardware PCF and a 9-sample Poisson disk filter for shadow smoothing.
